value.prop: Families have access to safe water

basic-info.alt: Indicator 1
Rating of Completion: Emergency  Temporary Solution 15 litres/person/day with temporary solutions (e.g. water trucking)
Comments: Emergency  Temporary Solution 15 litres/person/day with temporary solutions (e.g. water trucking)
Rating of Completion: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: 30litres/person/day with sustainable/resilient solution (e.g. hand pump; water system)
Comments: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: 30litres/person/day with sustainable/resilient solution (e.g. hand pump; water system)

value.prop: Families have access to hygiene promotion and sanitation
value.mustache: {{{Families have access to hygiene promotion and sanitation}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 2
Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution: 1 latrine for 50 people
Comments:Emergency - Temporary Solution: 1 latrine for 50 people
Rating of Completion: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: ODF / 1 latrine per family
Comments: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: ODF / 1 latrine per family

value.prop: Children and women have access basic heath services
value.mustache: {{{Children and women have access basic heath services}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 3
Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution:Mobile Brigades are providing basic health and nutrition services (at least the core elements of the minimum intervention  package)
Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution: Mobile Brigades are providing basic health and nutrition services (at least the core elements of the minimum intervention  package)

Rating of Completion: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Health facility with enough capacity to attend the additonal population at a distance not higher than 7Km is providing basic health and nutrition services (at least the core elements of the minimum intervention  package)

Comments: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Health facility with enough capacity to attend the additonal population at a distance not higher than 7Km is providing basic health and nutrition services (at least the core elements of the minimum intervention  package)

value.prop: Children aged 6-15 years old have access to education
value.mustache: {{{Children aged 6-15 years old have access to education}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 4
Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution: Children attend classes through safe access to temporary learning spaces with a teacher, blackboard, and student kits for all affected children
Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution: Children attend classes through safe access to temporary learning spaces with a teacher, blackboard, and student kits for all affected children
Rating of Completion: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Children have safe access to education through a rehabilitated/new/not-damaged school located at a maximum distance of XX Km
Comments: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Children have safe access to education through a rehabilitated/new/not-damaged school located at a maximum distance of XX Km

value.prop: Children (5-9 year olds) are receiving psychosocial support through Safe Spaces
value.mustache: {{{Children (5-9 year olds) are receiving psychosocial support through Safe Spaces}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 5

Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: CFS facilities with max. 20 children (5-9 years olds) with 2 adult facilitators; max. 25 children (10-12 years old) with 2 adult facilitators; max. 30 children (13-18 years old) with 2 adult facilitators.

Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: CFS facilities with max. 20 children (5-9 years olds) with 2 adult facilitators; max. 25 children (10-12 years old) with 2 adult facilitators; max. 30 children (13-18 years old) with 2 adult facilitators.

value.prop: Children have access to preventive and response services to violence and exploitation
value.mustache: {{{Children have access to preventive and response services to violence and exploitation}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 6

Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Case workers trained to prevent, report and respond to cases of violence and exploitation attend the site with a maximum 25 cases with all cases ending in either case closure or active care plan.

Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: Case workers trained to prevent, report and respond to cases of violence and exploitation attend the site with a maximum 25 cases with all cases ending in either case closure or active care plan.

value.prop: Children that lost their birth registration documents have been re-issued their documents
value.mustache: {{{Children that lost their birth registration documents have been re-issued their documents}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 7

Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: All children affected by the cyclone that lost registration documents have received new documents
Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution & Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: All children affected by the cyclone that lost registration documents have received new documents

value.prop: Families have access to behaviour change messages on health, nutrition, and safe and protection
value.mustache: {{{Families have access to behaviour change messages on health, nutrition, and safe and protection}}}

basic-info.alt: Indicator 8
Rating of Completion: Emergency - Temporary Solution: All families reached with behavior change communication on life saving skills, hygiene practices or information on uptake of services.
Comments: Emergency - Temporary Solution: All families reached with behavior change communication on life saving skills, hygiene practices or information on uptake of services.
Rating of Completion: Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: All families reached with behavior change communication on protective practices
Comments: Long term - Long term - Sustainable and Resilient Solution: All families reached with behavior change communication on protective practices
